attributes.action: stop wasting taxpayers money on unnecessary things and stop creating or allowing contradictory laws which create or enhance rather than solve problems in society today.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A list of probs followed by govs contradictory response/law:

debt problems = build casinos

teenage pregnancies = give them homes/benefits

covering losses = penalise innocent motorist by increased premiums

burglaries = law defends burglar not home owner

prison overcrowding = make it as luxury as poss with tv gym all paid by our taxes

pollution = charge for everything. blame motorist AGAIN

re-offenders = lousy sentences and never full length served

immigrants = very poor border control and no immigration system

THESE ISSUES WOULD BE A GOOD STARTING POINT!!!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
